model.name: name on your spider| required

login.auth_func: function that checks if login was successful | required

model.scrape_url: url for page you want to scrape

wanted_attributes.file_name: name on file to store scraped attributes | required
wanted_attributes.elements: element selectors for elements you want | required

wanted_text.file_name: name on file to store scraped text | required
wanted_text.elements: element selectors for elements you want | required

unwanted_elements: elements you want to remove from page | optional
